Notes: Analyzed Immediately, On-site parameter. The lab may run this as well, but HT should be applied to field measurements. Added 99 b/c will always fail.
RIBS samples are not run for Nitrate as a stand-alone test, it is determined by calculation (NO2/NO3 - NO2), the holding time here does not apply in most cases. Set HT limit to 999
Analyzed Immediately, On-site parameter. The lab may run this as well, but HT should be applied to field measurements. Added 999 b/c will always fail.
Analyzed Immediately, On-site parameter. The lab may run this as well, but HT should be applied to field measurements. Added 999 b/c will always fail.
This is the holding time for frozen filters. Samples must be filtered by the lab within 48 hours of collection. This is indicated in the 'prep_date' field.
